name: CYBERIA (itch) (PHASEIN)
description:
CYBERIA is a dream for some and a nightmare for others. It is an experiment in "topoanalysis", which is the "study of human identity as it relates to the places in people's lives". It is an amalgamation of some of my favorite club spaces, reconstructed from memory, and connected in a topologically unreal way. It's a club that is also a DOOM map.

The space is recursive, preventing easy construction of a mental map of the environment. The player experience in the space mirrors closely my own experiences in these spaces.

Press F to smoke. Press G to take some acid. Don't lose your mind. :)

Music: Gesloten Cirkel - Submit X, Function - Disaffected, Walton - Rolla, Stenny - Wipe Out, Rrose - Waterfall, Regis - Blood Witness
